title: ICYMI - Last Week's Top Stories Including Mask Wars, College During COVID-19 & More
itunes:title: ICYMI - Last Week's Top Stories Including Mask Wars, College During COVID-19 & More
description:
Trevor breaks down the week's top stories, including the politicization of face masks, how colleges are adapting to social distance, and the battle over reopening some states.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
